mission: Marvel Comics tragedy: THRONE PANEL! Peres finally sits, but 'ACTING PM' floats mockingly above! Tries lifting peace hammer - ALMOST worthy! STRAIN LINES! Operation Grapes panels: MISSILES EVERYWHERE! 'What have I done?!' Qana disaster: SCARLET WITCH-level accident! HORROR! Election battle: BIBI vs PERES! Epic clash panels! '1% MARGIN!' So close! CRUSHING DEFEAT! Lifetime montage panels: Always the bridesmaid. 'MR. PEACE' becomes 'President of... Nothing.' Final panel: Age 93, arc reactor dims... still dreaming. Editor's note: 'The Eternal Runner-Up Rests.'

input.hook:
**[SCENE START]**

**INT. THRONE ROOM - DAY**

Dust motes dance in ethereal shafts of light. SHIMMERING LETTERS form above a vacant throne: "ACTING PM."

PERES, aged but resolute, walks towards it. The throne is ornate, impossibly grand. He reaches out, then his hand moves to a gleaming, impossibly heavy HAMMER, etched with "PEACE."

He strains, veins popping. The hammer budges. JUST. A. WHISPER.

**PERES**
(A strained gasp)
Almost...

**[SCENE END]**

output.optimized_script: The throne awaits; Peres finally sits.  But the 'Acting PM' title mocks his every move. He reaches for the gavel, a weighty symbol of power, strain etched deep on his face. Operation Grapes erupts, a nightmare of missiles raining down uncontrollably.  What have I done? The Qana disaster unfolds, a catastrophic accident.  Horror grips the nation.  The election battle rages; Bibi and Peres clash. A razor-thin margin of one percent!  An agonizingly close defeat. Always the bridesmaid, never the bride.  Mr. Peace becomes President of… nothing at all.  At ninety-three, his dreams dim, a legacy unfulfilled.
